The watch features 130+ exercise modes with GOMORE-powered performance analysis, 7-type motion recognition, plus daily health guidance for a smarter, healthier lifestyle.

Comes with Always-on Display, featuring 150 AOD Watch faces to match the main dial, providing the richest customization options. The ideal smartwatch for seamless transitions from the boardroom to adventure!

It offers 24/7 medical-grade heart rate/SpO2/stress monitoring, women’s health features to track menstrual cycles and retrospective ovulation estimates, smart hydration & posture reminders, plus precision step counting with GOMORE technology—all with advanced wear detection!

It’s advanced Smart Movement Algorithm tracks your workouts in detail – Ink. aerobic/anaerobic performance, training load, and recovery time.   • Fast Pair makes it easy to connect your Pixel phone and Buds so you can listen to music on the go.³
  • Includes Google Wallet for contactless payments, turn-by-turn directions using Google Maps, and event notifications via Google Calendar.⁴
  • Get it done on the go: respond to messages, manage your inbox and make calls directly from this smartwatch.⁵
  • 5 ATM (50 metres) water resistance and scratch-resistant Corning® Gorilla® Glass.⁶
  • Up to 24 hour battery life.⁷
  • Inside you’ll find a Google Pixel Watch, Active band (small), USB-C® magnetic charging cable, and Quick Start Guide.
  • Matte Black Stainless Steel case with Obsidian Active band.
  • The active band has an adjustable fit and has a durable, waterproof construction, making it great for workouts.
  • Customise your watch face with colours and layouts that match your style; switch between digital, analogue, and modern, graphic looks.
  • Feel protected with Emergency SOS; alert trusted contacts if you’re feeling unsafe.⁸
  • Easily control compatible smart home devices directly from your wrist.⁹
  •  06 Month Warranty

products.description_html:
• Bluetooth Connectivity: This allows you to wirelessly connect your devices, such as smartphones or tablets, to play music.
  • Sound Quality: Look for speakers with good sound performance, including clear highs and deep bass.
  • Battery Life: Check how long the battery lasts on a single charge. Longer battery life is particularly useful for extended listening sessions.
  • Portability: Features like a carrying handle or compact design make it easier to transport.
  • Durability: Some models are designed to be water-resistant or rugged, making them suitable for outdoor use.
  • Additional Features: Depending on the model, you might find extras like an FM radio, USB ports for charging devices, or built-in LED lights.
  • 1 Month Warranty

products.product_title: BB-8608 Outdoor Karaoke Bluetooth Speaker
products.description_html:
• Karaoke Functionality: Look for features like dual microphone inputs, echo control, and vocal effects to enhance your karaoke experience.
  • Bluetooth Connectivity: This allows you to stream music wirelessly from your phone or other devices.
  • Sound Quality: High-quality speakers typically feature good bass response and clear vocals, important for both music and karaoke.
  • Portability: Many outdoor speakers come with handles or wheels for easy transport, along with a durable build to withstand various weather conditions.
  • Battery Life: Check the battery life to ensure it lasts long enough for your events or parties.
  • Additional Features: Some models might include features like LED lights for a visual effect, a remote control, or even a built-in FM radio.

  • Battery Life: A longer battery life allows for more extended use without needing frequent recharges.
  • Connectivity: Check for Bluetooth compatibility and/or auxiliary inputs for wired connections.
  • Durability: If you plan to use it outdoors, consider speakers that are water-resistant or rugged.
  • Size and Portability: Ensure the speaker size suits your needs for portability and storage.

  • Sensitive Voice Pickup:  4 microphones with 32KHz sampling rate transmit your voice in stunning definition and clarity. Full duplex communication ensures clear 2-way audio even when both ends are speaking simultaneously.
  • Seamless Experience: PowerConf S500 has Zoom Rooms certification and works with Google Meet to ensure high-quality and reliable communication experiences on third party platforms.

  • Double Up:  Wirelessly pair two S500s to increase coverage in rooms of up to 20 people.

2. High power output: USB-A1 and USB-C1 ports support a maximum power output of 30W, while USB-C2 and USB-C3 ports support a maximum power output of 100W, allowing for fast charging of compatible devices.

products.product_title: Ugreen ‎80888 USB C Micro SD Card Reader
products.description_html:
• 5Gbps High-speed Data Transfer: UGREEN USB C memory card reader support data transfer up to 5Gbps, 10X faster than USB 2.0 (480Mbps), which allows you to transfer an HD movie or files in seconds and it also backward with USB 2.0 and USB 1.1. Support memory card capacity up to 2TB, sharing your happiness on social media in just seconds via USB C to SD card reader.
  • Dual Slot Card Reader: The 2-in-1 USB C to SD card adapter gives you the flexibility and convenience of accessing multiple types of memory cards. With support for reading and writing 2 cards simultaneously, you can easily review files or back up and archive photos and videos in UHS-I SD, SDHC, SDXC, MICRO SD, MICRO SDHC, MICRO SDXC cards. Moreover, it supports UHS-II SD/TF cards, but the speed will be UHS-I.
  • Plug and Play: The external USB C memory card reader with no exact App or driver required, which compatible with Windows 10/8.1/8/7/XP/Vista, Mac OS, Chrome, Linux, etc. Stable bidirectional transmission avoids trouble for unplugging and re-plugging, safety is ensured for your important files in memory cards and connected USB C devices.
  • Convenient Portability: Designed with a piece of braided nylon cable so it won’t block your other ports, easy access to neighboring ports. The micro sd card reader fits easily into your pocket, backpack, briefcase, or laptop bag. Integrated USB Type-C cable lets you quickly connect to a computer or pack it up quickly when you’re done using it, without having to carry an additional cable with you.
  • Universal Compatibility: UGREEN USB C SD card reader is widely compatible with MacBook Pro M1/2020/2019/2018/2017/2016, iMac, iMac Pro, XPS 13/15, Mac Mini after 2018, iPad Pro 2020/2018, iPad Air 2020, Microsoft Surface Book 2, Surface Go, Surface Studio 2, Surface Pro 7, Samsung Galaxy S20/S10/Note 20/Note 10, Moto G8/G7, OnePlus 8/ 8 Pro/ 7T/ 7T Pro and more USB-C devices.
